thread.title: C&S Group Enterprises LLC Announces Conference Call to Review the First-Quarter 2018 Results for the Period Ended December 30, 2017.

author: cnbc.com
title: C&S Group Enterprises LLC Announces Conference Call to Review the First-Quarter 2018 Results for the Period Ended December 30, 2017.
text:
KEENE, N.H.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- C&S Group Enterprises LLC (the “Company”) announced today that a teleconference will be held on Tuesday, February 13, 2018 at 11:00 a.m. ET, during which the Company’s management will discuss the Quarterly Report for the period ended December 30, 2017. A question and answer period will follow management’s presentation of the operating results. A recording of the conference call will be available until midnight on Tuesday, February 27, 2018.
Pursuant to the terms of the indenture governing the Company’s Senior Secured Notes due 2022, access to the call and the recording will be limited to current holders of Senior Secured Notes, prospective investors, analysts and market makers in the Senior Secured Notes. Instructions for participation in the call and the recording will be made available to permitted participants by logging on to www.IntraLinks.com and accessing the Company’s secure web page. Login information for the Company’s IntraLinks page will be made available to participants who have requested such information via e-mail through our Investor Relations page at www.cswg.com . The Quarterly Report will be made available on our secure IntraLinks page on Monday, February 12, 2018.
C&S Group Enterprises LLC , through its affiliate C&S Wholesale Grocers, Inc. (“C&S”), based in Keene, NH, is the largest wholesale grocery supply company in the U.S., and an industry leader in supply chain innovation. Founded in 1918 as a supplier to independent grocery stores, C&S now services customers of all sizes, supplying approximately 13,000 independent supermarkets, chain stores, military bases, and institutions with over 146,000 different products.
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180207005723/en/
